item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 14, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Zig's new LinkedList API (it's time to learn fieldParentPtr) (94 points | 55 comments)
2. Kezurou-Kai #39 (167 points | 9 comments)
3. Omnom: Self-hosted bookmarking with searchable, wysiwyg snapshots [showcase] (36 points | 11 comments)

5. Everything wrong with MCP (303 points | 131 comments)
6. Albert Einstein's theory of relativity in words of four letters or less (1999) (179 points | 90 comments)

8. Open guide to equity compensation (498 points | 208 comments)
9. Zotero Fullscreen Mode by Script (8 points | 3 comments)
10. Mario Vargas Llosa has died (123 points | 17 comments)
11. Show HN: Resurrecting Infocom's Unix Z-Machine with Cosmopolitan (107 points | 23 comments)
12. Show HN: I made a free tool that analyzes SEC filings and posts detailed reports (198 points | 53 comments)
13. New Vulnerability in GitHub Copilot, Cursor: Hackers Can Weaponize Code Agents (127 points | 62 comments)
14. Googler... ex-Googler (613 points | 446 comments)
15. NoProp: Training neural networks without back-propagation or forward-propagation (123 points | 29 comments)
16. Why Everything in the Universe Turns More Complex (103 points | 59 comments)
17. Kotlin, Swift, and Ruby losing popularity (14 points | 10 comments)
18. Writing Cursor rules with a Cursor rule (118 points | 34 comments)
19. Implementing DeepSeek R1's GRPO algorithm from scratch (151 points | 3 comments)
20. Transformer Lab (102 points | 9 comments)
21. Neutrinos' maximum possible mass shrinks further (58 points | 21 comments)
22. Why Fennel? (247 points | 114 comments)
23. Comparing economic inequality between the Roman Empire and the Han Dynasty (53 points | 50 comments)
24. Math 13 – An Introduction to Abstract Mathematics [pdf] (153 points | 9 comments)
25. Quick Primer on MCP Using Ollama and LangChain (107 points | 18 comments)
26. Docker Model Runner (78 points | 23 comments)
27. The dark side of the Moomins (297 points | 96 comments)
28. I bought a Mac (209 points | 105 comments)
29. How much oranger do red orange bags make oranges look? (138 points | 78 comments)
30. Show HN: Nissan's Leaf app doesn't have a home screen widget so I made my own (102 points | 74 comments)
